resources.string: Check your Internet and Try Again.

This is an App that predicts the Home and Away winning percentage of each team in English Premier League using their data for the last decade. 

The model is developed using XgBoost library. 

App developed by :
 Moideen Nazaif V M
 Nelisha Najeeb
 Rizwan T A
 Sarath Lal
 Shifa Mohammed
